backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor implementing patient registration and cardiovascular risk assessment with role-based access control, calculating risk scores based on age, chronic conditions, smoking, respiratory/general symptoms, and social factors.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a request to revert the codebase to Version 6, listing 11 frontend files and 5 components affected by changes in versions 7-11.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of 13 frontend files describing the HeartSense AI application structure, including routing, layout components, assessment forms, deployment docs, and watermark guard utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with HSL-based design tokens defining color variables for light and dark themes using a monochrome/grayscale palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the HeartSense AI application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining routes for landing page (/) and assessment page (/assessment) within AppLayout wrapper component.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer component displaying medical disclaimer, Caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking, and copyright year.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Sticky header with HeartSense AI branding, Activity icon, and navigation buttons for Home and Start Assessment.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing consistent header, main content outlet, and footer structure across all pages.
frontend/src/components/Disclaimer.tsx: Reusable alert component displaying medical disclaimer with warning icon stating the tool is for educational purposes only.
frontend/src/components/WatermarkGuard.t: Empty file placeholder for watermark detection component.
frontend/src/config/socialLinks.ts: Empty file placeholder for social links configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing ICP actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, automatically invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query mutation hook for submitting assessment input to backend calculateRisk method with hardcoded patientId of 0.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with HSL color system defining comprehensive design tokens for light and dark themes with proper color contrast.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point rendering App within QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AssessmentPage.tsx: React component for health risk assessment form that collects user data (age, gender, medical history, symptoms) and displays calculated risk results with recommendations.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page component featuring hero section, feature cards explaining HeartSense AI benefits, and a how-it-works section with navigation to assessment page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme colors (using CSS variables), container settings, border radius variables, and animations for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project metadata file indicating a request to revert codebase to Version 6, discarding changes from versions 7-11.
